title: Homepage load performance and featured listings display
description: Verify that the homepage loads within 3 seconds and that featured property listings are displayed correctly with accurate information.

steps.description: Open the homepage URL
Verify the page fully loads within 3 seconds
Check that featured listings section is visible
Verify featured properties display correct images, titles, prices, and summary info

title: Advanced property search filtering
description: Verify property search filters by location, price range, type, and amenities return correct and relevant results.

steps.description: Navigate to search page
Set location filter to specific area in Gamasa city
Set price range filter to defined minimum and maximum
Select property type and amenities from available options
Execute search
Verify that all search results match filter criteria
Verify property details shown in list are accurate and consistent

title: Interactive map property location markers
description: Verify that the interactive map displays property locations correctly with responsive and accurate markers.

steps.description: Navigate to the search page or property listing page with map view
Verify map loads and displays properties as markers within map bounds
Zoom in and out on the map
Ensure markers update and remain correctly positioned
Click on a property marker
Verify that clicking a marker displays correct property information popup

title: User sign-up with valid credentials
description: Verify new users can register successfully with valid information and receive confirmation of account creation.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page
Input valid user details including email, password, and required fields
Submit registration form
Verify registration success message is displayed and user is logged in or prompted to log in

title: User login with correct and incorrect credentials
description: Verify that a user can login successfully with correct credentials and receives an error message with incorrect credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username/email and correct password
Click on login button
Confirm successful login and navigation to user dashboard or homepage
Log out
Enter invalid username/email or wrong password
Click on login button
Verify appropriate error message is shown and login is denied

title: User profile creation and update with validation
description: Verify users can create and update their profile information including personal and contact details, and that input validation is applied correctly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to profile settings page
Update profile fields with valid data
Save changes
Verify changes are persisted and displayed correctly
Attempt to input invalid data (e.g., invalid email format, empty mandatory fields)
Save changes
Verify appropriate validation error messages prevent saving invalid data

title: Add Property Multi-step form validation and submission
description: Verify property owners can complete the multi-step Add Property form, including photo uploads and location tagging, and successfully submit the listing for review.

steps.description: Login as property owner and navigate to Add Property page
Complete step 1 with basic property info
Proceed to step 2 and upload property photos
Verify photo upload functionality works and previews are shown
Proceed to step 3 and use map to tag property location
Verify that location tagging on map is accurate and can be adjusted
Submit the completed form
Confirm property listing is saved and submitted for review with appropriate confirmation message
Attempt to submit the form with missing mandatory fields in each step
Verify form validation prevents submission and displays relevant error messages

title: Edit and manage own property listings in My Properties
description: Verify property owners can view, edit details, and manage status of their property listings in the My Properties section.

steps.description: Login as property owner and navigate to My Properties
Verify list of owned properties is displayed with correct details
Select a property to edit
Modify property details and save
Confirm updates are saved and reflected in the listing
Change property listing status (e.g. active, inactive)
Verify status changes are applied and visible

title: Favorites functionality: save and retrieve preferred properties
description: Verify users can add properties to favorites, persist selections across sessions, and retrieve the favorite properties list correctly.

steps.description: Login and browse property listings
Add multiple properties to favorites
Verify UI indicates properties are favorited
Log out and log back in
Navigate to Favorites page
Verify previously favorited properties are present and accurate
Remove a property from favorites
Confirm property is removed from the favorites list immediately

title: Internal messaging system functionality between users and property owners
description: Verify that authenticated users can send and receive messages to/from property owners with proper permissions enforced and messages delivered promptly.

steps.description: Login as a user and navigate to a property detail page
Send a message to the property owner/agent via internal messaging system
Verify message is sent and confirmation is shown
Login as the property owner/agent
Navigate to Messages section and verify new message is received
Reply to the received message
Verify reply is sent and reflected in conversation history
Attempt to send message to unauthorized recipients
Verify system blocks unauthorized messaging attempts

title: Real-time notifications for bookings, messages, and listing updates
description: Validate that real-time notifications arrive promptly reflecting the latest booking statuses, message arrivals, and property listing updates.

steps.description: Login as a user
Trigger notification event such as receiving a new message, booking update, or property listing change
Verify notification appears in real-time without page refresh
Open notifications page
Verify notification is listed with accurate details and timestamps

title: Booking creation, update, and cancellation
description: Verify users can create, view, update, and cancel bookings securely and reliably with appropriate status updates reflected.

steps.description: Login as a user
Navigate to a property detail page and create a new booking with valid details
Verify booking confirmation is received and booking data is stored
Navigate to Bookings management page
Update booking details such as dates or number of guests
Confirm booking updates are saved and displayed
Cancel the existing booking
Verify booking status changes to cancelled and user is notified

title: Admin dashboard access and management functions
description: Validate that admins can access the dashboard to view platform statistics, manage users and property listings, and enforce proper access control.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to Admin Dashboard page
Verify platform statistics display accurate user and listing metrics
Access user management section and modify user status or details
Confirm user changes are saved and reflected
Access property listings management and perform actions like approval or removal
Verify listings management actions succeed and update listing statuses correctly
Attempt to access Admin Dashboard as non-admin user
Verify access is denied with appropriate error

title: Property details page correctness and completeness
description: Verify that detailed property pages display all relevant information including images, descriptions, amenities, and agent contact info accurately.

steps.description: Search for and navigate to a specific property detail page
Verify property images load correctly and can be browsed
Confirm property description, features, and amenities are shown accurately
Check agent contact information is visible and correct
